item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (324 points | 180 comments)
2. Show HN: Magnitude – open-source, AI-native test framework for web apps (39 points | 14 comments)
3. Eurorack Knob Idea (162 points | 60 comments)
4. Tumor-derived erythropoietin acts as immunosuppressive switch in cancer immunity (57 points | 3 comments)
5. Large Language Models, Small Labor Market Effects [pdf] (25 points | 3 comments)
6. A Love Letter to People Who Believe in People (194 points | 42 comments)
7. UIT – performant, modular, low-memory file processing at scale, in the Cloud (13 points | 1 comment)
8. Huge reproducibility project fails to validate biomedical studies (55 points | 22 comments)
9. Foundry (YC F24) Is Hiring – Come Build a World Model for the Web ( | hide)
10. Notation as a Tool of Thought (1979) (277 points | 72 comments)
11. Exploiting Undefined Behavior in C/C++ Programs: The Performance Impact [pdf] (54 points | 29 comments)

13. "Poetry City": Iowa City, Iowa (28 points | 6 comments)
14. Exercise before bed is linked with disrupted sleep (58 points | 34 comments)
15. A Scaled Down Look at Spending, Revenue, and What's Being Cut (30 points | 13 comments)
16. What If We Could Rebuild Kafka from Scratch? (160 points | 149 comments)
17. Dolphins Communicate with 'Fountains of Pee' (16 points | 3 comments)

20. I made a college punching bag for rejected highschoolers (46 points | 15 comments)
21. Show HN: BugStalker - a modern Rust debugger (79 points | 8 comments)
22. I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022) (741 points | 536 comments)
23. The Policy Puppetry Prompt: Novel bypass for major LLMs (149 points | 127 comments)
24. OpenAI releases image generation in the API (466 points | 272 comments)
25. Tarpit ideas: What they are and how to avoid them (2023) [video] (119 points | 126 comments)
26. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (369 points | 594 comments)
27. A Visual Journey Through Async Rust (122 points | 19 comments)
28. A $20k American-made electric pickup with no paint, no stereo, no screen (386 points | 381 comments)
29. OpenVSX, which VSCode forks rely on for extensions, down for 24 hours (234 points | 139 comments)
30. Instant SQL for results as you type in DuckDB UI (355 points | 117 comments)
